entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
